languages.text: After the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} uses {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Carnival of Misery{/g}, for any target that has suffered and will suffer damage from the Executioner this combat (both prior to and after this ability is used), their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} does not reduce damage dealt by damage-over-time effects.
languages.original_text: После применения {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Карнавал страданий{/g} любая цель получившая урон от палача в бою (учитывает атаки до применения Carnival of Misery.) не может защищаться бронёй от ДоТ эффектов.

traits.locale_text: Until the end of combat, all Toxin and Burning effects ignore Armour. All Bleeding effects' damage is increased by 30%.

After the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} uses {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Carnival of Misery{/g}, for any target that has suffered and will suffer damage dealt by the Executioner this combat (both prior to and after this ability is used), the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} does not reduce damage dealt by damage-over-time effects.

Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} applied to the Executioner's enemies from any source ignore their targets' {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. The damage of all {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effects applied to the Executioner's enemies from any source is increased by +30%.

After the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} uses {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Carnival of Misery{/g}, for any target that has suffered and will suffer damage from the Executioner this combat (both prior to and after this ability is used), their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} does not reduce damage dealt by damage-over-time effects.

After the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} uses {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Carnival of Misery{/g}, for any target that has suffered and will suffer damage from the Executioner this combat (both prior to and after this ability is used), their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} does not reduce damage dealt by damage-over-time effects.

Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effects from any source inflicted on the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s enemies ignore their targets' {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of all {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effects from any source inflicted on the Executioner's enemies is increased by an additional +30%.

languages.text: Cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g} usa {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Carnaval de miseria{/g}, todos los objetivos que hayan sufrido daño del ejecutor y vayan a sufrirlo en este combate (antes y después de usar esta capacidad) no reducen el daño de los efectos de daño continuado con su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g}.
languages.original_text: After the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} uses {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Carnival of Misery{/g}, for any target that has suffered and will suffer damage from the Executioner this combat (both prior to and after this ability is used), their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} does not reduce damage dealt by damage-over-time effects.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g} usa {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Carnaval de miseria{/g}, todos los objetivos que hayan sufrido daño del ejecutor y vayan a sufrirlo en este combate (antes y después de usar esta capacidad) no reducen el daño de los efectos de daño continuado con su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}が{g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}慟哭のカーニバル{/g}を使用した後、この戦闘中にエクスキューショナーからすでにダメージを受けた、またはこれから受ける任意の対象に対して、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}は持続ダメージによる被ダメージを軽減しない。
languages.original_text: After the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} uses {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Carnival of Misery{/g}, for any target that has suffered and will suffer damage dealt by the Executioner this combat (both prior to and after this ability is used), the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} does not reduce damage dealt by damage-over-time effects.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘が終了するまで、あらゆるソースから{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}の敵に与えられたすべての{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}効果は、そのターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g}を無視する。エクスキューショナーの敵が受けたあらゆるソースからのすべての{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}出血{/g}効果の{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}ダメージ{/g}は、追加で+30%増加する。

languages.text: 当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}使用{g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}痛苦狂欢{/g}之后，所有在本场战斗中受到过行刑者伤害，以及后续承受行刑者伤害的目标（即发动此能力之前与之后的敌人），其{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}将无法减免持续伤害效果造成的伤害。
languages.original_text: After the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} uses {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Carnival of Misery{/g}, for any target that has suffered and will suffer damage from the Executioner this combat (both prior to and after this ability is used), their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} does not reduce damage dealt by damage-over-time effects.

traits.locale_text: 当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}使用{g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}痛苦狂欢{/g}之后，所有在本场战斗中受到过行刑者伤害，以及后续承受行刑者伤害的目标（即发动此能力之前与之后的敌人），其{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}将无法减免持续伤害效果造成的伤害。

languages.text: Setzt der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g} die Fähigkeit {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Fest der Qualen{/g} ein, reduziert die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} aller Ziele, die durch den Henker in diesem Kampf vor und nach dem Einsatz der Fähigkeit Schaden erleiden, keinen durch Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekte verursachten Schaden.
languages.original_text: After the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} uses {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Carnival of Misery{/g}, for any target that has suffered and will suffer damage from the Executioner this combat (both prior to and after this ability is used), their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} does not reduce damage dealt by damage-over-time effects.

traits.locale_text: Setzt der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g} die Fähigkeit {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Fest der Qualen{/g} ein, reduziert die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} aller Ziele, die durch den Henker in diesem Kampf vor und nach dem Einsatz der Fähigkeit Schaden erleiden, keinen durch Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekte verursachten Schaden.

languages.text: Une fois que l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteur{/g} a utilisé {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Carnaval de misère{/g}, pour toute cible à laquelle il a infligé ou inflige des dégâts au cours de ce combat (avant et après l'utilisation de la capacité), l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} ne réduit plus les dégâts des effets de dégâts progressifs.
languages.original_text: After the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} uses {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Carnival of Misery{/g}, for any target that has suffered and will suffer damage from the Executioner this combat (both prior to and after this ability is used), their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} does not reduce damage dealt by damage-over-time effects.

traits.locale_text: Une fois que l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteur{/g} a utilisé {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Carnaval de misère{/g}, pour toute cible à laquelle il a infligé ou inflige des dégâts au cours de ce combat (avant et après l'utilisation de la capacité), l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} ne réduit plus les dégâts des effets de dégâts progressifs.

Jusqu'à la fin du combat, les effets {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} infligés aux ennemis de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Exécuteur{/g} ignorent l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Déflexion{/g} de leur cible, et ce, quelle que soit leur source. Les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} des effets {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} infligés aux ennemis de l'Exécuteur sont augmentés de +30 % supplémentaires, et ce, quelle que soit leur source.

languages.text: Каждая цель, получившая урон от атак {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палача{/g} до и после использования им {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Карнавала страданий{/g} в этом бою, не может снижать урон от эффектов периодического урона за счет {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}брони{/g}.
languages.original_text: After the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} uses {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Carnival of Misery{/g}, for any target that has suffered and will suffer damage dealt by the Executioner this combat (both prior to and after this ability is used), the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} does not reduce damage dealt by damage-over-time effects.

traits.locale_text: Каждая цель, получившая урон от атак {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палача{/g} до и после использования им {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Карнавала страданий{/g} в этом бою, не может снижать урон от эффектов периодического урона за счет {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}брони{/g}.

До конца боя все эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}, наложенные на врагов {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палача{/g} из любых источников, игнорируют {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} своих целей. {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Урон{/g} от любого {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g}, наложенного на врагов палача из любых источников, увеличивается на 30% дополнительно.

Каждая цель, получившая урон от атак {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палача{/g} до и после использования им {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Карнавала страданий{/g} в этом бою, не может снижать урон от эффектов периодического урона за счет {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}брони{/g}.

Каждая цель, получившая урон от атак {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палача{/g} до и после использования им {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Карнавала страданий{/g} в этом бою, не может снижать урон от эффектов периодического урона за счет {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}брони{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Cellat{/g}, {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Izdırap Karnavalı{/g} kullandıktan sonra o çatışmada Cellat'tan hasar almış veya alacak tüm hedeflerin (bu kabiliyet kullanıldıktan önce ve sonra) {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} değerleri, zamanla hasar veren etkilerin sebep olduğu hasarı azaltmaz.
languages.original_text: After the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} uses {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Carnival of Misery{/g}, for any target that has suffered and will suffer damage from the Executioner this combat (both prior to and after this ability is used), their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} does not reduce damage dealt by damage-over-time effects.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Cellat{/g}, {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Izdırap Karnavalı{/g} kullandıktan sonra o çatışmada Cellat'tan hasar almış veya alacak tüm hedeflerin (bu kabiliyet kullanıldıktan önce ve sonra) {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} değerleri, zamanla hasar veren etkilerin sebep olduğu hasarı azaltmaz.

languages.text: После применения {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Карнавал страданий{/g} любая цель получившая урон от палача в бою (учитывает атаки до применения Carnival of Misery.) не может защищаться бронёй от ДоТ эффектов.

traits.locale_text: После применения {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Карнавал страданий{/g} любая цель получившая урон от палача в бою (учитывает атаки до применения Carnival of Misery.) не может защищаться бронёй от ДоТ эффектов.
